Sign In Create an Account

Read. Learn. Study remotely.

A powerful knowledge manager for web pages, textbooks, PDFs, to read and study with remotely.

Supports tagging, annotating, highlighting, keeping track of your reading progress, and makes it effortless to remember what you've learned. By yourself or in groups.

Create an Account
Already using Polar? Sign In

Effortless Reading and Learning

Discovery why Polar is the new standard for reading and learning. Easily manage your reading, track progress, annotate, auto-convert to flashcards, and learn using spaced repetition.

Organize your Reading

All your documents in one place, synchronized across all devices.

Remember Effortlessly

Flashcards from annotations in one click with spaced repetition algorithm.

Incremental Reading

Read multiple documents in parallel, manage queue, and track reading progress.

This is a must have for college students, med students, and researchers.

A Network of Documents

Your document repository for pdfs, webpages, ebooks. Read, track progress, archive, and reference at any time.

Viewer for Annotations and Notes

Integrated annotation viewer. Search, sort, and tag all annotations and comments in one place.

Incremental Reading to Manage Reading Queue

Manage with flags and tags. See progress of each document and filter by tags to quickly find your read.

Statistics to Stay Motivated

Motivate yourself with integrated statistics. Set a goal per per day for long term progress.

Integrated Document Viewer

Integrated document reader (PDF, webpages) to the best reading experience. Notes and highlights included

Desktop, Web, and Fully Cloud Aware

Cross-platform supported on MacOS, Windows, Linux, Chrome, Firefox, and Safari.

Polar is fully cloud-aware for real-time synchronization across multiple devices but also supports local storage for offline work if you prefer

Captured (and Offline) Web Content

Polar supports reading and annotating HTML documents. We call this process 'capturing' content and we store the document permanently in your own private archive.

Since most pages aren't designed for reading and have ads, chrome, and other annoyances within the page, we render the content as a tablet device to make the content more readable.

Browser emulation

Emulate multiple browsers and mobile content to make sure pages captured are rendered properly.

Personal Archive

All content is stored in a personal archive which allows you to refer back to important documents and view annotations over time.

Integrated Annotations Sidebar

All annotations are easily accessible in the sidebar. You can create flashcards, add comments, and jump to any text highlight in the main document at any time.

Through polar, I've set up a mind map of the content I consume which no other platform has yet done as wonderfully as Polar. Aayush Kucheria - Student

Pricing and Plans

Polar is designed to scale to from both novice users to Power users. Just need to read a few PDFs. No problem. Need to manage and read hundreds to thousands of documents? No problem.

Find a plan
that's right for you.

Free

$0

We want as many people to use Polar as possible. Most people easily stay within these limits.


Bronze

$4.99/month

Less than the price of a cup of coffee. Need more storage and ready to move up to the next level? We're ready when you are!

Silver

$9.99/month

Designed for Polar power users! Need more storage? Let's do this!


Gold

$14.99/month

You can't live without Polar and have a massive amount of data that you need to keep secure.

Support ---

Polar is always Open Source! We're "free as in liberty." Developers who contribute back to Polar get a year of cloud storage for free. If you'd like you can compile Polar from source directly but cloud usage fees still apply. Note that you can always use Polar without the cloud and just use the desktop app directly. This way Polar will be "free as in beer." Just make sure to backup your data!.
